item.title: By: Ray
item.dc:creator: Ray
item.description: Looks great! What were your alignment specs for the front?
item.content:encoded: Looks great! What were your alignment specs for the front?

item.title: By: Thomson Ho
item.dc:creator: Thomson Ho
item.description:
Great read Eric.
Just curious, how was it driving around the bay area with 225/40/18 on those regas? I know 880, 580, and 680 are not pretty at all. I would be too afraid to street on those beautiful sizes.
-Thomson
item.content:encoded:
Great read Eric.

Just curious, how was it driving around the bay area with 225/40/18 on those regas? I know 880, 580, and 680 are not pretty at all. I would be too afraid to street on those beautiful sizes.

-Thomson

item.title: By: Roy tang
item.dc:creator: Roy tang
item.description:
Is it on stock body? Won't your front fender rub with the 9.5?
Anyways it's very very nice. I'm just contemplating if I should use a set of aged wheels.
Roy fd3s owner in singapore.
item.content:encoded:
Is it on stock body? Won’t your front fender rub with the 9.5?

Anyways it’s very very nice. I’m just contemplating if I should use a set of aged wheels.

Roy fd3s owner in singapore.

item.title: By: WarShrike
item.dc:creator: WarShrike
item.description:
I just happened to come across this. I'd searched heavy for some in 18x10.5 but nothing would come up in my needed bolt pattern 5x120.
Such an awesome wheel, gives that Le Mans feel as well. Great work!
item.content:encoded:
I just happened to come across this. I’d searched heavy for some in 18×10.5 but nothing would come up in my needed bolt pattern 5×120.

Such an awesome wheel, gives that Le Mans feel as well. Great work!

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2017/01/18x9-5-18x10-5-18-desmond-regamasters/#comment-438554">Roman</a>.
Contacted you on FaceBook.

item.title: By: Roman
item.dc:creator: Roman
item.description: Fantastic job. Can you share William's contacts? I need to refinish my set. Thanks
item.content:encoded: Fantastic job. Can you share William’s contacts? I need to refinish my set. Thanks

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2017/01/18x9-5-18x10-5-18-desmond-regamasters/#comment-436284">Dave</a>.
Thanks Dave! That's also awesome that you are the original owner of a '95 FD!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Dave.

Thanks Dave! That’s also awesome that you are the original owner of a ’95 FD!

item.title: By: Dave
item.dc:creator: Dave
item.description:
Wow, those wheels look awesome now and fit the character of the FD nicely. Well done on all the work to get this in their current condition.
Dave in San Jose (orig owner black 95FD)
item.content:encoded:
Wow, those wheels look awesome now and fit the character of the FD nicely. Well done on all the work to get this in their current condition.

Dave in San Jose (orig owner black 95FD)

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2017/01/18x9-5-18x10-5-18-desmond-regamasters/#comment-435853">Jon</a>.
Nature of the game. Big name manufacturers like Advan, Volk, BBS, etc. all use paint on their wheels and they chip as well.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jon.

Nature of the game. Big name manufacturers like Advan, Volk, BBS, etc. all use paint on their wheels and they chip as well.

item.title: By: Jon
item.dc:creator: Jon
item.description: Aren't you worried about the wheels chipping fairly easily? I know someone with BBS LM faces that are painted with automotive grade paint and a TON of clear and he's already seeing chips here and there within a year of having them done (They were mounted April on 2016)...
item.content:encoded: Aren’t you worried about the wheels chipping fairly easily? I know someone with BBS LM faces that are painted with automotive grade paint and a TON of clear and he’s already seeing chips here and there within a year of having them done (They were mounted April on 2016)…
